about_the_game:
Hi ! This is a very early demo of Unlimited, hope you like it :)
It's an alpha build ! Don't hesitate to give your feedback on the Discord, it might be buggy sometime ^^.



Inspired by racing game giants like "F-Zero" and "Wipeout," Unlimited offers a different take on high-speed racing, adding a level of freedom. Your performance isn't the only thing that matters—get creative!

Here, you can take off, skip parts of the track, and showcase your piloting skills to gain valuable seconds. However, to keep the challenge alive, your boost is directly fueled by the road. Without it, you won't get far.

Your Feedback is Valuable

I'm very interested in your feedback and comments. Join the Discord server to share your thoughts and suggestions, which could have a significant impact on future development stages. Stay informed about upcoming features and additions.

Key Features


Fly!
Unlimited is a racing game where speed and flight coexist. Get creative! You can literally fly off the track.


Realistic and Demanding Piloting
This is not an arcade racing game! Unlimited's physics are designed for realistic handling. The ship has substantial inertia, and its maneuverability can become particularly complex at higher speeds.


Boost Management
The boost system encourages you to go faster and faster. The more you accelerate, the more boost you gain, thereby increasing both speed and piloting difficulty.


Challenge Your Friends and the Community!
Play with up to 12 players in a match, against AI or online players. Your best times will be saved, allowing you to compete with your friends.

Future Development Stages

The game is currently in development, with an Early Access release planned for mid-2024. You can expect gameplay adjustments, as well as the addition of new maps and universes.

Don't forget to add Unlimited to your wishlist and come share your ideas on Discord. Your contribution matters a lot!
